name: Color Sort Stack
description:
The most satisfying color sort puzzle!

Can you sort all colors?

- Move each card to its perfect place.
- Create order out of chromatic chaos.
- Lose yourself in a tranquil world of color!
- Renovate your house to relax!

Enjoy!!
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
